scripts.start:backend: node scripts/waitForKafka.js backend && cd backend && npm start
scripts.start:bot: node scripts/waitForKafka.js bot-service && cd bot-service && npm start
scripts.start:wholeBackend: concurrently -n BACKEND,BOT -c cyan,magenta "npm run start:backend" " npm run start:bot"
scripts.start: concurrently -n BACKEND,FRONTEND,BOT -c yellow,cyan,magenta "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:bot"
scripts.debug: concurrently -n BACKEND,FRONTEND,BOT -c yellow,cyan,magenta "npm run debug:backend" "npm run debug:frontend" "npm run debug:bot"
scripts.preinstall: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:bot
